description._content:
Title: A surgical operation

Creator: Stimson, Benjamin Alston

Date: 1918

Notes: Part of an album containing 134 photographs and 47 postcards relating to U.S. Army Base Hospital No. 45 (Medical College of Virginia unit), Toul, France, in World War I.

Call No: P & P C1:81

Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.

Repository: Library of Virginia, Special Collections, Prints and Photographs, 800 E. Broad St., Richmond, VA, 23219, USA. Contact: 804-692-3703.
